data.lyric:
[ti:Surface Pressure (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Jessica Darrow]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Surface Pressure (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version) - Jessica Darrow
[00:02.18]Lyrics by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:04.37]Composed by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:06.55]I'm the strong one
[00:07.97]I'm not nervous
[00:09.30]I'm as tough as the crust of the earth is
[00:11.72]
[00:14.59]I move mountains
[00:16.09]I move churches
[00:17.35]And I glow 'cause I know what my worth is
[00:19.72]
[00:22.64]I don't ask how hard the work is
[00:25.36]Got a rough indestructible surface
[00:27.63]Diamonds and platinum I find 'em I flatten 'em
[00:30.19]I take what I'm handed I break what's demanded but
[00:33.46]Under the surface
[00:34.66]I feel berserk as a tightrope walker in a three-ring circus
[00:38.76]Under the surface
[00:40.12]Was Hercules ever like "Yo I don't wanna fight Cerberus"
[00:44.15]Under the surface
[00:45.08]
[00:45.77]I'm pretty sure I'm worthless if I can't be of service
[00:48.91]A flaw or a crack
[00:50.36]The straw in the stack
[00:51.91]That breaks the camel's back
[00:52.83]What breaks the camel's back
[00:54.15]It's pressure like a drip drip drip that'll never stop whoa
[00:58.93]
[00:59.92]Pressure that'll tip tip tip 'til you just go pop whoa-uh-uh
[01:05.18]Give it to your sister your sister's older
[01:07.88]Give her all the heavy things we can't shoulder
[01:10.56]Who am I if I can't run with the ball
[01:13.84]
[01:14.52]If I fall to
[01:15.99]Pressure like a grip grip grip and it won't let go whoa
[01:20.28]
[01:21.16]Pressure like a tick tick tick 'til it's ready to blow whoa-uh-uh
[01:26.50]Give it to your sister your sister's stronger
[01:29.15]See if she can hang on a little longer
[01:31.76]Who am I if I can't carry it all
[01:35.24]If I falter
[01:36.90]
[01:37.43]Under the surface
[01:38.73]I hide my nerves and it worsens I worry something is gonna hurt us
[01:42.79]Under the surface
[01:43.61]
[01:44.37]The ship doesn't swerve as it heard how big the iceberg is
[01:48.10]Under the surface
[01:49.02]
[01:49.58]I think about my purpose
[01:51.09]Can I somehow preserve this
[01:52.27]
[01:53.09]Line up the dominoes
[01:54.38]A light wind blows
[01:55.70]You try to stop it tumbling
[01:57.01]But on and on it goes
[01:58.22]But wait
[01:58.81]
[02:00.14]If I could shake the crushing weight
[02:05.00]
[02:05.52]Of expectations would that free some room up for joy
[02:10.18]
[02:10.89]Or relaxation
[02:12.75]
[02:13.66]Or simple pleasure
[02:16.07]Instead we measure this growing pressure
[02:21.13]
[02:21.90]Keeps growing keep going
[02:26.58]
[02:27.22]'Cause all we know is
[02:30.53]Pressure like a drip drip drip that'll never stop woah
[02:34.92]
[02:35.89]Pressure that'll tip tip tip 'til you just go pop woah-oh-oh
[02:41.21]Give it to your sister it doesn't hurt and
[02:43.73]See if she can handle every family burden
[02:46.40]Watch as she buckles and bends but never breaks
[02:49.66]
[02:51.66]No mistakes just
[02:53.16]Pressure like a grip grip grip and it won't let go woah
[02:57.61]
[02:58.50]Pressure like a tick tick tick 'til it's ready to blow woah-oh-oh
[03:03.84]Give it to your sister and never wonder
[03:06.44]If the same pressure would've pulled you under
[03:09.08]Who am I if I don't have what it takes
[03:12.32]No cracks no breaks
[03:15.66]No mistakes
[03:16.70]No pressure
data.trans:
[ti:Surface Pressure (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Jessica Darrow]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.18]//
[00:04.37]//
[00:06.55]我是强者的化身
[00:07.97]从不感到紧张
[00:09.30]我如地壳一般坚韧
[00:11.72]
[00:14.59]我移动群山峰峦
[00:16.09]我挪动教堂
[00:17.35]我容光焕发 因为我知道自己的价值所在
[00:19.72]
[00:22.64]我不会质疑工作有多么艰辛
[00:25.36]我内心强大 坚不可摧
[00:27.63]我找到钻石和白金 将它们碾碎
[00:30.19]我肩负着使命 我打破所有规则
[00:33.46]但在我的内心深处
[00:34.66]我怒火中烧 就像马戏团里走钢丝的人一样失去控制
[00:38.76]在我的内心深处
[00:40.12]就像赫拉克勒斯一样呐喊着 我不想跟刻耳柏洛斯大战一场
[00:44.15]在我的内心深处
[00:45.08]
[00:45.77]我确信如果我帮不上一点忙 那我就一无是处
[00:48.91]瑕疵还是裂缝
[00:50.36]就像成堆的稻草一样
[00:51.91]压断骆驼的脊背
[00:52.83]究竟是什么压断了骆驼的脊背
[00:54.15]压力如水滴那般不停滴落 永不停歇
[00:58.93]
[00:59.92]压力倾泻而出 直到你彻底崩溃
[01:05.18]将难题交给你的姐姐 她比你年长
[01:07.88]将我们无法承受的重担都交给她
[01:10.56]如果我无力招架 那我算什么
[01:13.84]
[01:14.52]如果我输得一败涂地
[01:15.99]压力掌控一切 不会轻易放手
[01:20.28]
[01:21.16]压力滴答作响 随时都有可能爆炸
[01:26.50]将难题交给你的姐姐 她比你强大
[01:29.15]看她能否再坚持一会儿
[01:31.76]如果我无法承受 那我算什么
[01:35.24]如果我瑟瑟发抖
[01:36.90]
[01:37.43]在我的内心深处
[01:38.73]我故作镇定却事与愿违 我担心我们会受到伤害
[01:42.79]在我的内心深处
[01:43.61]
[01:44.37]当人们听说前方横亘着巨大的冰山时 这艘船却没有调转方向
[01:48.10]在我的内心深处
[01:49.02]
[01:49.58]我思索着我的决心
[01:51.09]我能否保护我的家人
[01:52.27]
[01:53.09]将多米诺骨牌排列整齐
[01:54.38]一阵微风拂过
[01:55.70]你试图阻止多米诺骨牌倒下
[01:57.01]但是无济于事
[01:58.22]等一下
[01:58.81]
[02:00.14]如果我能摆脱
[02:05.00]
[02:05.52]那沉重的期许 我会不会感觉愉悦一些
[02:10.18]
[02:10.89]或者放松身心
[02:12.75]
[02:13.66]亦或是体会到纯粹的快乐
[02:16.07]而不是测量那些肆意滋长的压力
[02:21.13]
[02:21.90]不断增加 一往无前
[02:26.58]
[02:27.22]因为我们只知道
[02:30.53]压力如水滴那般不停滴落 永不停歇
[02:34.92]
[02:35.89]压力倾泻而出 直到你彻底崩溃
[02:41.21]将难题交给你的姐姐 不会对我造成一丝伤害
[02:43.73]看她能否应对家庭的重担
[02:46.40]看着她竭尽全力地挑起重担 从未屈服于现状
[02:49.66]
[02:51.66]毫无过错
[02:53.16]压力掌控一切 不会轻易放手
[02:57.61]
[02:58.50]压力滴答作响 随时都有可能爆炸
[03:03.84]将难题交给你的姐姐 绝不会胡思乱想
[03:06.44]同样的压力会对你横加阻挠
[03:09.08]如果我没有能耐 那我算什么
[03:12.32]完美无缺 所向披靡
[03:15.66]毫无过错
[03:16.70]毫无压力
